32 class sceneFilter
33 {
34  public:
35  sceneFilter();
36  //Node handle
37  ros::NodeHandle nh;
38  private:
39 
40  //Message Subscriber
41  ros::Subscriber sub_stream_;
42 
43  //Message Publisher
44  ros::Publisher pub_stream_;
45 
46  //Message callback, gets executed when a new message is available on topic
47  void new_cloud_in_stream(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr& message);
48 
49  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr scene_stream_;
50 
51  //parameters
52  bool filter_, downsample_, keep_organized_, change_frame_, erase_plane_, filer_applied;
53  double xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax,zmin,zmax,leaf_, table_pad_;
54  std::string new_frame_, camera_frame_, new_scene_topic_;
55 
56  // geometry_msgs::TransformStamped tf_transform_;
57  Eigen::Affine3d transform_;
58 
59  //Transformation
60 
61 };
62 
63 //Constructor
64 sceneFilter::sceneFilter()
65 {
66  nh = ros::NodeHandle("scene_filter_node");
67  scene_stream_ = pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
68 
69  //subscribe to depth_registered pointclouds topic
70  std::string topic = nh.resolveName("/camera/depth_registered/points");
71  sub_stream_ = nh.subscribe(topic, 1, &sceneFilter::new_cloud_in_stream, this);
72 
73  nh.param<std::string>("/scene_filter/new_scene_topic", new_scene_topic_, "/scene_filter/scene_filtered");
74  pub_stream_ = nh.advertise<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> > (new_scene_topic_.c_str(),1);
75 
76  //load parameters
77  nh.param<bool>("/scene_filter/filter", filter_, "false");
78  nh.param<bool>("/scene_filter/downsample", downsample_, "false");
79  nh.param<bool>("/scene_filter/keep_organized", keep_organized_, "false");
80  nh.param<bool>("/scene_filter/change_frame", change_frame_, "false");
81  nh.param<bool>("/scene_filter/erase_plane", erase_plane_, "false");
82  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/xmin", xmin, -1.2);
83  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/xmax", xmax, 0);
84  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/ymin", ymin, -0.6);
85  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/ymax", ymax, 0.4);
86  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/zmin", zmin, -0.0);
87  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/zmax", zmax, 1.0);
88  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/leaf_s", leaf_, 0.01);
89  nh.param<double>("/scene_filter/table_pad", table_pad_, 0.01);
90  nh.param<std::string>("/scene_filter/camera_frame", camera_frame_, "camera_rgb_optical_frame");
91 
92  transform_ = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
93  filer_applied = false;
94 
95  if (change_frame_)
96  {
97 
98  nh.param<std::string>("/scene_filter/new_frame", new_frame_, "");
99  ROS_INFO("Waiting for transform from %s to %s", new_frame_.c_str(), camera_frame_.c_str());
100  tf::TransformListener listener_transform;
101  tf::StampedTransform transformToBaseLink;
102  if (listener_transform.waitForTransform(new_frame_.c_str(), camera_frame_.c_str() , ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(10)))
103  {
104  listener_transform.lookupTransform(new_frame_.c_str(), camera_frame_.c_str() , ros::Time(0), transformToBaseLink);
105  ROS_INFO("Transform from %s to %s exists", new_frame_.c_str(), camera_frame_.c_str());
106  }
107  else
108  {
109  ROS_INFO("Transform from %s to %s does not exists, Identity will be used", new_frame_.c_str(), camera_frame_.c_str());
110  }
111  tf::transformTFToEigen(transformToBaseLink, transform_);
112  filer_applied = true;
113  }
114 
115 }
116 
117 void sceneFilter::new_cloud_in_stream(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2::ConstPtr& message)
118 {
119  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr tmp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
120  //constantly copy cloud from stream into class scene_stream_ to be accessible for service callback
121  pcl::fromROSMsg (*message, *tmp);
122 
123  if (change_frame_)
124  {
125  pcl::transformPointCloud (*tmp, *scene_stream_, transform_);
126  pcl::copyPointCloud(*scene_stream_, *tmp);
127  tmp->header.frame_id = new_frame_.c_str();
128  }
129 
130  //check if we need to filter stream
131  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/filter", filter_);
132  if (filter_)
133  {
134  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/xmin", xmin);
135  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/xmax", xmax);
136  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/ymin", ymin);
137  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/zmin", zmin);
138  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/ymax", ymax);
139  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/zmax", zmax);
140  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/keep_organized", keep_organized_);
141  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/table_pad", table_pad_);
142  pcl::PassThrough<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> pass;
143  if (keep_organized_)
144  {
145  pass.setKeepOrganized(true);
146  }
147  pass.setInputCloud (tmp);
148  pass.setFilterFieldName ("z");
149  pass.setFilterLimits (zmin, zmax);
150  pass.filter (*tmp);
151  pass.setInputCloud (tmp);
152  pass.setFilterFieldName ("y");
153  pass.setFilterLimits (ymin, ymax);
154  pass.filter (*tmp);
155  pass.setInputCloud (tmp);
156  pass.setFilterFieldName ("x");
157  pass.setFilterLimits (xmin, xmax);
158  pass.filter (*scene_stream_);
159  pcl::copyPointCloud(*scene_stream_ , *tmp);
160  filer_applied = true;
161  }
162 
163  if (erase_plane_)
164  {
165  // Create the segmentation object for the planar model and set all the parameters
166  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> seg;
167  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers (new pcl::PointIndices);
168  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coefficients (new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
169 
170  seg.setOptimizeCoefficients (true);
171  seg.setModelType (pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
172  seg.setMethodType (pcl::SAC_LMEDS);
173  seg.setMaxIterations (100);
174  seg.setDistanceThreshold (table_pad_);
175  // 0.005
176 
177  // Segment the largest planar component from the remaining cloud
178  seg.setInputCloud (tmp);
179  seg.segment (*inliers, *coefficients);
180 
181  if (inliers->indices.size () == 0)
182  {
183  ROS_INFO( "Could not estimate a planar model for the given dataset." );
184 
185  }
186 
187  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> extract;
188  extract.setInputCloud (tmp);
189  extract.setIndices (inliers);
190  extract.setNegative (true);
191  extract.filter (*scene_stream_);
192 
193  pcl::copyPointCloud(*scene_stream_ , *tmp);
194  filer_applied = true;
195  }
196 
197  //check if we need to downsample stream
198  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/downsample", downsample_);
199  if (downsample_)
200  {
201 
202  nh.getParam("/scene_filter/leaf_s", leaf_);
203  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> vg;
204  vg.setInputCloud (tmp);
205  vg.setLeafSize(leaf_, leaf_, leaf_);
206  vg.filter (*scene_stream_);
207  filer_applied = true;
208  }
209 
210  if ( filer_applied == false)
211  {
212  ROS_INFO("NO filer_applied");
213  pcl::copyPointCloud(*tmp, *scene_stream_);
214  }
215 
216  pub_stream_.publish( *scene_stream_ ); //republish the modified scene
217 
218 }
219 
220 int main(int argc, char **argv)
221 {
222  ros::init(argc, argv, "scene_filter_node");
223  sceneFilter node;
224  ROS_INFO("[sceneFilter] Node is ready");
225 
226  double spin_rate = 10;
227  ros::param::get("~spin_rate",spin_rate);
228  ROS_DEBUG( "Spin Rate %lf", spin_rate);
229 
230  ros::Rate rate(spin_rate);
231 
232  while (node.nh.ok())
233  {
234  ros::spinOnce();
235  rate.sleep();
236  }
237  return 0;
238 }
